MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY16 postcode area of St Andrews. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5:00pm in order to remove a birds nest from our overhead line network near Greenacres and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:00pm on Friday, 06 November 2020
